doc.field: Series IV. Lamb, Articles and Addresses
Series IV. Lamb, Articles and Addresses
"Lion Gardiner, Founder of the Manor of Gardiner's Island": copy of address read before N-YHS Nov. 5, 1878; see also "Manor of Gardiner's Island," (MAH Jan. 1885)
"Lion Gardiner, Founder of the Manor of Gardiner's Island": copy of address read before N-YHS Nov. 5, 1878; see also "Manor of Gardiner's Island," (MAH Jan. 1885)

With newspaper accounts of Lamb reading the paper before the New Haven Historical Society, 1882. Also contains a long New York Times piece, "Lion Gardiner's Island," dated August 10, 1879 and signed "E.A.D.," which is probably by Lamb.
